title: What's wrong with matchmaking at the moment - it feels legitimately broken
body:
Every game is like this. I get matched with legit new players level 5-10, and the other team gets silver and sometimes gold players, every game, just over and over the other team is silver and gold players and I gelevel 5-10 first timers.

I get it that It's not ranked, I have ranked accounts also. But it takes 3 times as long as it should to level accounts when every game is a loss due to completely unbalanced unwinnable games. The new players just feed the entire game, snowballing the better players on the other team. No one's blaming the new players, obviously they're just expecting to queue and get matched against similarly matched opponents, most probably don't op.gg the games and realise they're getting placed in games they have no chance of winning

This isn't the best picture to make my point it was just the first one I thought of screenshotting. I've had games where there's a level 4 and a level 6 on my team and the enemy team has 2 legit gold players
